title: This RTX 4070-powered Asus gaming laptop is a ludicrously low $999
description:
Black Friday is finally here, folks. If you happen to be on the prowl for a blazingly fast gaming laptop, you’re in luck. Best Buy’s currently selling the Asus TUF Gaming Laptop for just $999.99, which is a massive savings of $400 and a flat-out ludicrously good price for a laptop this powerful.

This monster of a machine comes with an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 GPU as well as 1TB of SSD storage. That’s some serious graphics firepower right there and a good amount of

title: 25 best Amazon Black Friday tech deals: Nov 24
description:
Black Friday is here, bringing an avalanche of tech deals from a variety of retailers—most especially Amazon.

Without a doubt, the sheer scope of discounted products on Amazon can be daunting. Our guide to the 25 best Amazon Black Friday tech deals is here to point you to some of the best bargains in a variety of categories. Every pick is vetted by one of PCWorld’s expert reviewers based on either hands-on experience with the product, a comparative evaluation of specs and price, positive user feedback and brand reputation, or any combination of those factors.

Expect our top 25 list to change as new deals come on the scene throughout the shopping holiday.

For even more deals, check out PCWorld’s Black Friday deals page.

title: Best Black Friday iPad deals: Nov. 24
description:
If there’s a good time to find a deal on an Apple tablet, it’s on Black Friday or Cyber Monday. And if there’s a good Black Friday to find a deal, it’s this one, since Apple hasn’t released any new iPad models in over a year. There should be plenty of models on store shelves just waiting for eager buyers to snatch them up at a significant discount.

If you want even more tech deals, be sure to check out our complete Black Friday/Cyber Monday coverage.

Best Black Friday iPad and iPad Mini deals
